message.content:
cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.CL. 

The paper describes a formal language for describing movies shot by shot, which is intended to serve as a high-level user interface for intelligent cinematography and editing systems. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), Computer Vision (cs.CV), Graphics (cs.GR), Multimedia (cs.MM), or Computation and Language (cs.CL) sub-categories.
